mapper.sql: slot_name, plugin, slot_type, datoid, database, temporary, active, active_pid, xmin, catalog_xmin, restart_lsn, confirmed_flush_lsn, wal_status, safe_wal_size, two_phase, two_phase_at, inactive_since, conflicting, invalidation_reason, failover, synced
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pg_replication_slots
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pg_replication_slots (slot_name, plugin, slot_type, datoid, database, temporary, active, active_pid, xmin, catalog_xmin, restart_lsn, confirmed_flush_lsn, wal_status, safe_wal_size, two_phase, two_phase_at, inactive_since, conflicting, invalidation_reason, failover, synced ) values (#{slotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plugin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slotType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{database,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temporary,jdbcType=BIT}, #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, #{activePid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xmin,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{catalogXmin,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{restartLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{confirmedFlushLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{walStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safeWalSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twoPhase,jdbcType=BIT}, #{twoPhaseAt,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{inactiveSince,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{conflicting,jdbcType=BIT}, #{invalidationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failover,jdbcType=BIT}, #{synced,jdbcType=BIT} )

mapper.update:
update pg_replication_slots
slot_name = #{row.slotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plugin = #{row.plugin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slot_type = #{row.slotType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datoid = #{row.datoid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
database = #{row.database,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temporary = #{row.temporary,jdbcType=BIT},
active = #{row.active,jdbcType=BIT},
active_pid = #{row.activePid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xmin = #{row.xmin,jdbcType=OTHER},
catalog_xmin = #{row.catalogXmin,jdbcType=OTHER},
restart_lsn = #{row.restartLsn,jdbcType=OTHER},
confirmed_flush_lsn = #{row.confirmedFlushLsn,jdbcType=OTHER},
wal_status = #{row.walStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safe_wal_size = #{row.safeWalSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
two_phase = #{row.twoPhase,jdbcType=BIT},
two_phase_at = #{row.twoPhaseAt,jdbcType=OTHER},
inactive_since = #{row.inactiveSince,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
conflicting = #{row.conflicting,jdbcType=BIT},
invalidation_reason = #{row.invalidationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
failover = #{row.failover,jdbcType=BIT},
synced = #{row.synced,jdbcType=BIT},

update pg_replication_slots set slot_name = #{row.slotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plugin = #{row.plugin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slot_type = #{row.slotType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datoid = #{row.datoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, database = #{row.database,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temporary = #{row.temporary,jdbcType=BIT}, active = #{row.active,jdbcType=BIT}, active_pid = #{row.activePid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xmin = #{row.xmin,jdbcType=OTHER}, catalog_xmin = #{row.catalogXmin,jdbcType=OTHER}, restart_lsn = #{row.restartLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, confirmed_flush_lsn = #{row.confirmedFlushLsn,jdbcType=OTHER}, wal_status = #{row.walStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safe_wal_size = #{row.safeWalSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, two_phase = #{row.twoPhase,jdbcType=BIT}, two_phase_at = #{row.twoPhaseAt,jdbcType=OTHER}, inactive_since = #{row.inactiveSince,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, conflicting = #{row.conflicting,jdbcType=BIT}, invalidation_reason = #{row.invalidationReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, failover = #{row.failover,jdbcType=BIT}, synced = #{row.synced,jdbcType=BIT}
